title: Consolidate Product Facings
description: As stock of an item sells down, an associate needs to consolidate the remaining units to make the shelf look full (a process called 'facing').

tasks.description: Identify a product on the shelf that has gaps or looks depleted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds an area that needs merchandising attention.

tasks.description: Pull all units of the product to the front of the shelf.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shelf now looks neat and full.

tasks.description: Check the shelf tag to ensure it is accurate and visible.
tasks.expected_outcome: The product is well-presented and easy for customers to shop.
